snippet: A public service campaign aimed at potentially suicidal men introduces a fictional therapist, Dr. Rich Mahogany, a “manly” mustachioed cross between Dr. Phil and Ron Burgundy.
abstract: Andrew Adam Newman Advertising column highlights a humorous public service campaign based in Colorado aimed at potentially suicidal men.
lead_paragraph: A public service campaign aimed at potentially suicidal men introduces a fictional therapist, Dr. Rich Mahogany, a “manly” mustachioed cross between Dr. Phil and Ron Burgundy.

headline.seo: A Humorous Approach to a Serious Issue: Suicide Prevention
headline.main: A Light Approach to a Grim Issue: Suicide Prevention
headline.print_headline: A Light Approach to a Grim Issue: Suicide Prevention
